title: Be a Cyber Physical Systems Leader
description:
Explore Model-based Systems Engineering (MBSE) and its implementation with the 3DEXPERIENCE platform.

This Learning path highlights the need and relevance of Systems Engineering for development of complex cyber physical systems. It ensures deep understanding of Systems Engineering and Model-based Systems Engineering (MBSE) and its concepts., the audience will be able to comprehend the Process-Methods-Tools approach and learn in depth about Cyber MagicGrid methodology.

courses.title: Discover Systems Engineering
courses.description: Systems Engineering has evolved over the years and gained significance in the modern world. Take a brief look at the evolution of Systems Engineering and understand the significance of...

courses.title: What is Systems Thinking?
courses.description: Discover Systems Thinking and its benefits. Also, understand how lack of Systems Thinking may cause system failures.

courses.title: Systems Engineering Core Concepts
courses.description: Experience the evolution of systems from product to System of Systems (SoS) and learn important Systems Engineering concepts.

courses.title: Foundation of Model-based Systems Engineering
courses.description: Learn about Model-based Systems Engineering and its key concepts. Discover some interesting stories about how the Model-based Systems Engineering is implemented.

courses.title: Modeling Cyber Physical Systems in a Methodological Framework
courses.description: Learn about the process, methods and the tools to implement Systems Engineering. Explore the Cyber MagicGrid methodology developed at DASSAULT SYSTEMES. Also, learn how the Cyber...

courses.title: Systems Engineering Portfolio
courses.description: Discover how the 3DEXPERIENCE platform supports the Model-based Systems Engineering for the automotive application. Also, explore the different apps available for Systems Engineering.

courses.title: Cyber MagicGrid in Action
courses.description: Experience the implementation of Model-based Systems Engineering to develop a coffee machine system. Observe the use of the Cyber MagicGrid methodology.

courses.title: Systems Engineering References
courses.description: Explore additional information about the systems engineering.

title: Be a Cyber Physical Systems Specialist
description: This learning path provides the knowledge, key concepts and application of the model-based systems engineering. The contents of the path are structured and sequenced with a guided and systematic approach to aware you about the activities associated with the Systems Engineer role. It also covers how the systems engineering solutions from DASSAULT SYSTEMES delivers a unique, open and extensible development platform to fully support the model-based systems engineering.

title: Be a Lightweight Mechanical Designer
description:
Learn the way industries use powder bed fusion manufacturing techniques to produce parts.

This learning path provides a systematic learn-by-doing approach about the preparation and validation of Additive Manufacturing process. It covers the domain knowledge related to Industrial considerations and applications of additive manufacturing. It also covers the know-how of preparing the parts to be manufactured and optimizing the powder bed manufacturing techniques.

Duration : 12 Hours

title: Be an Additive Manufacturing Designer
description:
Lead the product design for additive manufacturing to produce the optimal lightweight part.

This learning path provides a systematic learn-by-doing approach about the concepts of the Design for Additive Manufacturing. It covers the domain knowledge related to Industrial considerations and applications of additive manufacturing. It also covers the know-how of designing lightweight parts using topological optimization process and finding the design that best meets the requirements.

Duration : 12 Hours

courses.title: Getting Started with Additive Manufacturing
courses.description: Discover the basics of additive manufacturing and new world of Design possibilities emerging in many industries.
